    LlmAgent
    The LLM-based agent.
    class 
    LoopAgent
    An agent that runs its sub-agents sequentially in a loop.
    class 
    ParallelAgent
    A shell agent that runs its sub-agents in parallel in isolated manner.

    An agent that runs its sub-agents sequentially.
